alwaysUseActor.name: Always link to actor
alwaysUseActor.hint: Link the token hotbar to the actor even if the token is unlinked.

useCustomHotbar.name: Use Custom Hotbar

enableHotbar.name: Enable Token Hotbar
enableHotbar.hint: Enable the Token Hotbar on this client. NOTE: If you don' see the token bar with this module setting checked is probably because the GM has activated the module settings 'Enable Token Hotbar by role' to a value not equal to 'none'.

enableHotbarByRole.name: Enable Token Hotbar by role (default role is GM)
enableHotbarByRole.hint: Enable the Token Hotbar by role (default role is GM). THIS WILL DISABLE ANY 'Enable Token Hotbar' set to true if the value is not 'none'.

reset.name: Reset settings to default

reset.hint: This will reset all of the settings of back to the active game system's default.

debug.label: Prints debug messages to the console

resetsettings.title: Reset Module Settings
